attributes.action: Pay all NHS workers a one off £1000 tax free bonus from the British people.
attributes.additional_details: Show appreciation for all NHS workers when lockdown ends by rewarding them with a bonus.
attributes.background: A one off payment for NHS workers from the British people to say thank you for all their hard work and dedication during the pandemic.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495

Pay NHS staff a one-off bonus that recognises their efforts to combat covid.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578308

Pay 15% bonus to public facing NHS staff
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570762
